mapper.select: select id, title, summary, img_name, img_path, uploaded_at, create_country, create_year, is_subscribe_yn, category, genre, director, price, delete_yn from content where delete_yn = 0;

select id, title, summary, img_name, img_path, uploaded_at, create_country, create_year, is_subscribe_yn, category, genre, director, price, delete_yn from content where title=#{title} and delete_yn = 0;
mapper.insert: insert into content (id, title, summary, img_name, img_path, uploaded_at, create_country, create_year, is_subscribe_yn, category, genre, director, price, delete_yn) VALUES ( #{id}, #{title}, #{summary}, #{imgName}, #{imgPath}, now(), #{createCountry}, #{createYear}, #{isSubscribeYn}, #{category}, #{genre}, #{director}, #{price}, 0 )
